reviewText: When bought on phone would not show it was another country had to play on computer to watch
Came late and then it does not even play in USA
Sadly, this DVD does not work in my region ~ A WORD OF WARNING: unless you live in Region 2 (ie. Europe, Japan, the Middle East, Egypt, South Africa, Greenland), you can't watch it
I was also uniformed these would not play. I tried 3 players and they all say error.

I don't usually do reviews, however, I live in the US and I was very disappointed to find out that this is for a different region, so it would not play in my DVD player, this could've been prevented if it said somewhere in its description what region it was.
